title: Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Mirror", September 13, 1934
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: NOTE!/THIS REVISES MIRROR/SETTING IN #520-13/AND ALL PREVIOUS DRAWINGS; inscribed in stamp in graphite, lower right: 520-15/ 3/4"=1'0" & F.S.; RKDUM/ 9/13/34; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, and materials; incribed in red color pencil on verso: VOID
description: Plan and elevation for peach (?) mirrors. Possibly a bathroom vanity mirror that opens into a cabinet, another mirror to right of vanity cabinet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Mirror", September 13, 1934.
September 13, 1934. Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-518.
